title: Endurance
description: Meghan’s training at the Academy is coming to an end.Everything is going great for her as she comes closer to the graduation. She is engaged to be married and the wedding is very near when she hears some disturbing news that makes her rethink all of her coming life.In class they are taught to catch dreams and fly with the speed of light. Meghan soon discovers that she has a lot of special talents and that she is much stronger than she thought. But unfortunately that doesn’t help her as she faces the truth about her own death which will be revealed to her at the end of the year.Endurance is the third book in the Afterlife-series about a young girl’s life after death.
author: T.P. Boje
